summary: This mod will add a new follower to the game that utilizes a custom follower framework custom voice and custom armor in three versions.
descriptionHtml:
[center][font=Comic Sans MS][size=3]After spending the last few months of watching and reading tutorials, I thought I would give modding a shot. It just seemed to be the right thing to do. Daisy will utilize a custom follower framework in which she is absent from the vanilla framework and thus will not count towards your follower count unless you use a follower mod such as AFT.  She will need to be above any follower mods in load order so the game can read them first. AFT also has a bug in which you will get an extra "can you do something" dialogue line, which doesn't affect anything. Note that this mod is in Beta mode meaning more can be added and tweaked.
The custom armor is only for the Standalone versions because players use different body types and it would be a mess.

Voicetype> ROSE
Location: Bronze Water Cave
Race> Wood Elf
Essential
Non-Marriageable (No marriage dialogue). 
Class> Spellsword
Height> 1.0
Weight> 100
Levels with the player and start's out at level 1.
All three main combats (Melee, Ranged, and Magic) with a left-handed sparks spell.
Skill bonuses include Conjuration, Archery, Blocking, Destruction, One-handed, and Sneaking.

[/size][/font]







[font=Comic Sans MS]CREDITS >[/font]

Goma Pero Poses

ENB Series[/font][/center]
